item.description: It's a pizza party/food drive! Join us in celebration of the Christmas season and bring a non-perishable food item (or 2, or 3) so that we may help a local charity/food bank serve the needs of the less fortunate or consider "sponsoring' a Christmas dinner for a needy family. Approximate cost per person to be determined but should not exceed $10.00 If you are able to join us, please RSVP so that we can make proper arrangements for all who wish to attend!
item.name: WM912 Christmas Party and Food Drive
